title: Hereâ€™s everything new in Safari on iOS 15.4 and macOS 12.3
content:
Apple released macOS Monterey 12.3 and iOS 15.4 on Monday, both of which include the latest update for the Safari web browser, version 15.4. In addition to the usual changelogs for both operating systems, Apple has also published a blog post revealing all the changes in the latest WebKit engine update, which powers Safari on

The post Here’s everything new in Safari on iOS 15.4 and macOS 12.3 appeared first on xda-developers.
